code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'./App.css';import Header from'./components/Header';import Footer from'./components/Footer';import Home from'./pages/Home';import Shop from'./pages/Shop';import ProductDetail from'./pages/ProductDetail';import Cart from'./pages/Cart';import Checkout from'./pages/Checkout';import AdminLogin from'./pages/AdminLogin';import AdminDashboard from'./pages/AdminDashboard';import{CartProvider}from'./context/CartContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[currentPage,setCurrentPage]=useState('home');const[isAdmin,setIsAdmin]=useState(false);const[adminToken,setAdminToken]=useState(localStorage.getItem('adminToken'));useEffect(()=>{if(adminToken){setIsAdmin(true);}},[adminToken]);const renderPage=()=>{switch(currentPage){case'home':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Home,{setCurrentPage:setCurrentPage});case'shop':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Shop,{setCurrentPage:setCurrentPage});case'product-detail':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProductDetail,{setCurrentPage:setCurrentPage});case'cart':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Cart,{setCurrentPage:setCurrentPage});case'checkout':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Checkout,{setCurrentPage:setCurrentPage});case'admin-login':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AdminLogin,{setCurrentPage:setCurrentPage,setAdminToken:setAdminToken});case'admin-dashboard':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AdminDashboard,{setCurrentPage:setCurrentPage});default:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Home,{setCurrentPage:setCurrentPage});}};const handleLogout=()=>{localStorage.removeItem('adminToken');setAdminToken(null);setIsAdmin(false);setCurrentPage('home');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CartProvider,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{currentPage:currentPage,setCurrentPage:setCurrentPage,isAdmin:isAdmin,onLogout:handleLogout}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{className:"main-content",children:renderPage()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{})]})});}export default App;
